attributes.action: restriction of 20 MPH agreed for Blakes Avenue New Malden Surrey.
attributes.additional_details: WE would also point out that the Children from Coombe Boys School are at risk. We have the support from all three Ward Councilors in making this application
attributes.background: We request that the MCNC Agree to recommend that a speeding restriction of 20 MPH be agreed for Blakes Avenue New Malden Surrey.  We consider that as drivers continually exceed the 30 MPH and that there has been some near misses with residents.  A 20 MPH would be appropriate.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Speed limits on local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

Since you have the support of local councillors, you could ask them to raise this issue for you.
